comment.author: 76758438@N03
comment._content:
How often does one come across a photograph of their great great aunt while researching an essay? 

The family stories I've heard - this woman lead an amazing life!

comment.author: 95912590@N00
comment._content: I love seeing and learning a little more about historic librarians, thanks for sharing! Just wanted to let you know I used this photo on my blog here: hiringlibrarians.com/2012/05/23/volunteer-experience-counts/
